title: Gran Turismo: Based on a True Story
writer: Jason Hall, Zach Baylin, Alex Tse
short_cast: David Harbour, Orlando Bloom, Archie Madekwe, Takehiro Hira, Darren Barnet, Geri Halliwell, Djimon Hounsou, Josha Stradowski
cast: David Harbour, Orlando Bloom, Archie Madekwe, Takehiro Hira, Darren Barnet, Geri Halliwell, Djimon Hounsou, Josha Stradowski
genre: Sports Movies, Drama Movies, Sports Dramas, Movies Based on Real Life, Action & Adventure Movies, US Movies

desc: Driven teenager Jann Mardenborough uses his video game skills to pursue a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity: becoming a pro racer. Based on a true story.
